channel.title: Pállas || Hyperion based
channel.description:
[center][img]http://dl.dropbox.com/u/15430412/pallas.png[/img][/center] [center][b][i][size=14pt]How we started:[/size][/i][/b] [size=12pt][color=purple]Pállas was started when I realized most of the servers on the toplist are pretty much just P.I's with slight changes. The base we will be basing the server of is [url=https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,381494.0.html]Hyperion[/url]. The reason we are using Hyperion is because of it's high stability and easiness to code. I will try to update this thread daily so try to keep it alive please. Also it will take me a couple days to do things as I have homework, sports and a life.[/size] [size=14pt][color=purple][i][b]Our goals:[/b][/i][/size] [color=purple][size=12pt]The current goals for Pallas is to perfect all skills, mini games, custom bosses and combat. The reason we have these as goals is because this will give players to do much more then just pk all day. Skills and custom bosses will also stimulate the economy.[/size] [size=14pt][b][i]Media:[/i][/b][/size] [IMG]http://i54.tinypic.com/10foy0z.png[/img] [IMG]http://i53.tinypic.com/3006vpf.png[/img]
Update blog: 10/15/2011: Downloaded base 10/16/2011: Adding more packets 10/17/2011: Started herblore
[size=14pt][b][i]Developers:[/i][/b][/size] [size=13pt][i][b]Daladubz[/b][/i][/size] [size=14pt][b][i]Credits:[/i][/b][/size] Graham Bando [/center]

item.title: Pállas || Hyperion based
item.dc:creator: @Daladubz Daladubz
item.description:
@Daladubz wrote:

[center][/center]

[center][size=14pt]How we started:[/size]
[size=12pt][color=purple]Pállas was started when I realized most of the servers on the toplist are pretty much just P.I’s with slight changes. The base we will be basing the server of is Hyperion. The reason we are using Hyperion is because of it’s high stability and easiness to code. I will try to update this thread daily so try to keep it alive please. Also it will take me a couple days to do things as I have homework, sports and a life.[/size]

[size=14pt][color=purple]Our goals:[/size]
[color=purple][size=12pt]The current goals for Pallas is to perfect all skills, mini games, custom bosses and combat. The reason we have these as goals is because this will give players to do much more then just pk all day. Skills and custom bosses will also stimulate the economy.[/size]

[size=14pt]Media:[/size]

Update blog: 10/15/2011: Downloaded base 10/16/2011: Adding more packets 10/17/2011: Started herblore
